nodes.documentation: Allows transfers on a token contract to be paused by an administrator.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @return true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.
nodes.name: paused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
